detaileddescription.para: This file defines platform-agnostic types used by base interface classes. These types provide a consistent API across different hardware platforms without exposing MCU-specific implementation details. All hardware abstraction layers use these common types for portability and consistency.

simplesect.para: These types are designed to be platform-independent and should not include any MCU-specific headers or definitions.
